channel.title: Blazing Chromes [Character Cards Signups]
channel.description:
@Shurian with a CC including the below. I'll reflect it upon my Discord Server ~~where I'll make it my slave.~~
## Sample Character Card
> ### Name > Age : 12 ~ 15 > Gender : Male/Female > Personality : (**Non-existent Character.** In the village, he is an asshole to anyone younger than him. Does not generally get along with people unless they're older.) > Skills : (Will be granted to you as the RP progresses.) > Statuses : (All statuses will be written by the host. Don't lose your limbs, or this will break your mind.)
Here is the Discord https://discord.gg/QeBN2VR55c Don't tell her, she's going to be pissed if she realises that the invite link has been leaked :D

item.title: Blazing Chromes [Character Cards Signups]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
@Shurian with a CC including the below. I’ll reflect it upon my Discord Server where I’ll make it my slave.

Sample Character Card

Name

Age : 12 ~ 15
Gender : Male/Female
Personality : (Non-existent Character. In the village, he is an asshole to anyone younger than him. Does not generally get along with people unless they’re older.)
Skills : (Will be granted to you as the RP progresses.)
Statuses : (All statuses will be written by the host. Don’t lose your limbs, or this will break your mind.)

Here is the Discord https://discord.gg/QeBN2VR55c
Don’t tell her, she’s going to be pissed if she realises that the invite link has been leaked

Read full topic
